description:
The ecotourism is now a word used by many actors in different contexts but sometimes with certain usage confusions. This Mooc, "ecotourism, let's do it together", aims to help you:

distinguish and define ecotourism among other forms of tourism;
identify issues of integration in territorial development;
analyze the framing of a project with ecotourism.

In a transdisciplinary approach between the sciences of ecology and the environment and those of economics of tourism, this course brings together different actors that put each of his views, vision or practice of ecotourism.

                                            Syllabus
                        Séquence 1. Écotourisme et biodiversitéSéquence 2. Écotourisme et écotouristesSéquence 3. Écotourisme, territoires et populations localesSéquence 4. Mise en pratique de l’écotourismeSéquence 5. Écotourisme et TICsSéquence 6. Zoom sur Cas (2 semaines)
title: L'écotourisme : Imaginons-le ensemble
